A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I signed up just to write this review. As a long time time Star Wars fan\, this movie was a total disappointment. The critics were wrong\, it’s a rip off of ESB/ROTJ and what a joke General Hux is as a character. Storyline was choppy and all over the place. This movie made a joke of the whole franchise. Don’t waste your money this is movie total waste of time. I can’t believe I waited 2 years to see this movie! (((Puke)))
